## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
I've been wondering about how transactions work on the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace. Do you need a third-party intermediary to execute transactions?

**AI Assistant:**
Actually, no, you don't need a third-party intermediary to execute transactions on the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace. The platform allows for completely decentralized transactions, executing peer-to-peer without any intermediary necessary. You can buy and sell VerusIDs on-chain, advertising your offer directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or posting the sale of your NFT on the worldwide blockchain for all to see. This way, you have full control over your transactions and assets.

**User:**
That's great to know! I've also been wondering about Verus Vault. Is it possible to spend funds from a VerusID that is locked with Verus Vault?

**AI Assistant:**
No, if you lock your VerusID with Verus Vault, you cannot spend funds from that identity at all until it is unlocked again. However, you can still receive funds and stake those same funds on the Verus network to earn rewards. This adds an extra layer of security to your assets, while still allowing you to benefit from staking.
Can you explain why Verus ID and NFT Marketplace requires a third-party intermediary to execute transactions?

Actually, the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace allows for completely decentralized transactions, executing peer-to-peer without any intermediary necessary. You can buy and sell VerusIDs on-chain, advertising your offer directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or posting the sale of your NFT on the worldwide blockchain for all to see.

#### Verus ID and NFT Marketplace
Buy and sell VerusIDs on-chain, advertising your offer directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or posting the sale of your NFT on the worldwide blockchain for all the world to see. Execute transactions in a completely decentralized way. Pay or offer to pay from a transparent or zero-knowledge private address, still auditable by you. Accept payment to either as well, and best of all, execute your transactions directly, peer-to-peer without any intermediary necessary. Don’t worry the on-chain model still makes room for owners to select and share proceeds with value added agents, marketing organizations, or other participants in a new economy of provable digital ownership. It’s the next step in the evolution of VerusID, the most powerful self-sovereign identity and secure storage model for funds in the digital world.#### Verus Vault
With Verus Vault you can now protect funds on a VerusID, even from theft of a private key! If you lock your VerusID with Vault you cannot spend funds from that identity at all until it is again unlocked. While locked, you can still stake those same funds on the Verus network and earn by doing so. Of course, you can also still receive funds.IT IS IMPORTANT TO NOTE THAT ENABLING REVOCATION, RECOVERY, AND ALL VERUS VAULT CAPABILITIES REQUIRE YOU TO HAVE ONE PRIMARY IDENTITY, AND AT LEAST ONE REVOCATION/RECOVERY ID CONFIGURED.
